bwwExcerpt: "Mr. Schreiber is such a complete actor that he has often thrown productions into imbalance, highlighting the inadequacy of the performances around him. That is not a problem here. That the excellent stage veteran Ms. Hecht holds her own with Mr. Schreiber is no surprise. That Ms. Johansson does - with seeming effortlessness - is."

keyPhrases.quote: Ms. Johansson does - with seeming effortlessness - is.
